newsitem.title: UK: Sullom Voe oil liftings fall, most stay in Britain.
newsitem.headline: Sullom Voe oil liftings fall, most stay in Britain.

text.p: Brent Blend crude oil loadings from Britain's Sullom Voe terminal fell to 550,207 tonnes in the week to June 3, from 707,598 tonnes the previous week, Shetland Islands Council said on Wednesday.
Over half the liftings went to refineries in Britain with the balance divided almost equally between the Americas and northwest Europe, the council said.
